verses.verse: I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon my <S%H4931>watch<s%>, and <S%H3320>set<s%> me upon the <S%H4692>tower<s%>, and will <S%H7200>look<s%> forth to <S%H7200>see<s%> what he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H7725>me<s%>, and what I shall answer concerning my <S%H8433>complaint<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>me<s%>, and said, <S%H3789>Write<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%>, and make it <S%H874>plain<s%> upon <S%H3871>tablets<s%>, that he may <S%H7323>run<s%> that readeth <S%H7121>it<s%>.

For the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is yet for the appointed <S%H4150>time<s%>, and it hasteth toward the <S%H7093>end<s%>, and <S%H6315>shall<s%> not <S%H3576>lie<s%>: though it <S%H4102>tarry<s%>, <S%H2442>wait<s%> for <S%H935>it<s%>; because it will surely <S%H935>come<s%>, it will not <S%H309>delay<s%>.
Behold <S%H5315><s%>, his soul is puffed <S%H6075>up<s%>, it is not <S%H3474>upright<s%> in <S%H6662>him<s%>; but the righteous shall <S%H2421>live<s%> by his <S%H530>faith<s%>.

Yea <S%H3196><s%>, moreover, wine is <S%H898>treacherous<s%>, a <S%H3093>haughty<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%>, that keepeth not at <S%H5115>home<s%>; who <S%H7337>enlargeth<s%> his <S%H5315>desire<s%> as <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, and he is as <S%H4194>death<s%>, and cannot be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>, but <S%H622>gathereth<s%> unto him all <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H6908>heapeth<s%> unto him all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

Shall not all these take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> against <S%H4426>him<s%>, and a taunting <S%H2420>proverb<s%> against <S%H559>him<s%>, and say, <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H7235>increaseth<s%> that which is not <S%H3513>his<s%>! how long? and that ladeth himself with <S%H5671>pledges<s%>!

Shall they not rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> that shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> <S%H3364>thee<s%>, and awake that shall <S%H2111>vex<s%> <S%H4933>thee<s%>, and thou shalt be for booty unto them?

Because thou hast <S%H7997>plundered<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, all the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall <S%H7997>plunder<s%> <S%H120>thee<s%>, because of men's <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H776>land<s%>, to the <S%H7151>city<s%> and to all that dwell <S%H3427>therein<s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that <S%H1214>getteth<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1215>gain<s%> for his <S%H1004>house<s%>, that he may <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, that he may be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>!

Thou hast <S%H3289>devised<s%> <S%H1322>shame<s%> to thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, by cutting <S%H7096>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For the <S%H68>stone<s%> shall cry <S%H2199>out<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and the beam <S%H3714>out<s%> of the <S%H6086>timber<s%> shall answer <S%H6030>it<s%>.
Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> a <S%H5892>town<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H3559>establisheth<s%> a <S%H7151>city<s%> by <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>!

Behold <S%H3068><s%>, is it not of Jehovah of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> that the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3021>labor<s%> for <S%H1767>the<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, and the <S%H3816>nations<s%> <S%H3286>weary<s%> themselves <S%H1767>for<s%> <S%H7385>vanity<s%>?

For the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that giveth his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%>, to thee that <S%H5596>addest<s%> thy <S%H2573>venom<s%>, and makest him <S%H7937>drunken<s%> <S%H5027>also<s%>, that thou mayest look on their <S%H4589>nakedness<s%>!

Thou art <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H7036>shame<s%>, and not <S%H3519>glory<s%>: <S%H8354>drink<s%> thou <S%H6188>also<s%>, and be as one uncircumcised; the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall come <S%H5437>round<s%> unto <S%H7022>thee<s%>, and foul shame shall be upon thy <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

For the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H7701>thee<s%>, and the destruction of the <S%H929>beasts<s%>, which made them <S%H2865>afraid<s%>; because of <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to the <S%H776>land<s%>, to the <S%H7151>city<s%> and to all that dwell <S%H3427>therein<s%>.

What <S%H3276>profiteth<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, that the <S%H3335>maker<s%> thereof hath <S%H6458>graven<s%> <S%H4541>it<s%>; the molten image, even the <S%H3384>teacher<s%> of <S%H8267>lies<s%>, that he that <S%H3335>fashioneth<s%> its <S%H3336>form<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> <S%H6213>therein<s%>, to make <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H457>idols<s%>?

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H6086>wood<s%>, <S%H6974>Awake<s%>; to the <S%H1748>dumb<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>, <S%H5782>Arise<s%>! Shall this <S%H3384>teach<s%>? <S%H8610>Behold<s%>, it is overlaid with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and there is no <S%H7307>breath<s%> at all in the midst of <S%H7130>it<s%>.
But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>: let all the <S%H776>earth<s%> keep <S%H2013>silence<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
